full_summary:
### Title
EP902-221050 B LaSalle Causeway Bascule Bridge Controls Replacement and Electrical Repairs
### Français
EP902-221050 B Remplacement des commandes du pont basculant du pont-jetée LaSalle et réparations électriques

### Tender Announcement Notification
Tender Closing Date: April 19, 2023 at 2 PM EDT
Tender Status: Cancelled

### Solicitation Overview
This solicitation is for a qualified contractor to provide bridge control replacement and electrical repair services for the LaSalle Causeway Bascule Bridge in Kingston, Ontario.

### Technical Specifications
The work includes replacement of bridge controls and electrical repairs as per the specifications and drawings that will be provided once a non-disclosure agreement is signed. The contractor is required to complete the work by October 1, 2024.

### Solicitation Method
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under a Competitive - Open bidding format. The selection criterion will be the lowest price.

### Security Clearance
This tender contains a security clearance requirement.

### Site Visit and Confidentiality
An optional site visit is scheduled for March 29 at 10 AM EDT. Due to confidentiality reasons, the specifications and drawings will only be made available after the bidder has signed the non-disclosure agreement in appendix 5.

### Contact Information
Andrew Jefferson (SPAC/PSPC)

Email: andrew.jefferson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15778437?extsite=MTU3Nzg0MzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### End Date
April 19, 2023

### Event End Date
2023-01-31
